content: LOCKEDNo bids in yet, going to lock this thread and sell these when the market changes.  If you are still interested, send an offer my wayAUCTION TERMSItem for Sale: https://store.bitcoinmagazine.com/collections/magazines/?sort_by=created-ascendingComplete set (Issues 1-22, original issues).  Sealed, never opened, stored in a safe until now.  You cannot buy this complete set anymore, and some of the issues are no longer available.NO - I WILL NOT SELL ISSUE #1 BY ITSELF Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.2 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.01 BTCBuy It Now:  0.5 BTCAuction End Time: Friday, 16 December 2022 22:00:00.000 GMTAuction End Time Epoch: 1671228000Sniping:  No sniping. 10 minute standard sniping rule.Shipping: Ships from USA. Free Shipping to USA.  Buyer pays shipping outside of USA.  Buyer responsible for any and all customs/dutiesPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer (prefer OgNasty or minerjones)All Images: https://imgur.com/a/dOeVjnM

comments.author: okimzti
comments.body: Curious...is the price too high?  Or just no interest in these?

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Price seems pretty reasonable to me. I wouldn’t sell my first issue for less than 0.05 BTC.Just seems to be no love for magazines at the moment

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Its a good price. Id buy them if i could. I think its just Christmas and everyone needs $. Bitcoin magazine selling whats left of their issue #1 right now for $2100. The rest all sell for $200 to $600.

comments.body: Great set! I don't have the money, otherwise I'd be interested. Just FYI - I sold two full sets brand new in plastic on ebay a few years ago (with ebay fees though). If you don't get any hits here, then that's always an option

comments.body: Damn you are teasing me!  I am going to think about it.These days the love for magazines is far seek
